briefTitle: A Long-term Trial of OPA-15406 in Infants With Atopic Dermatitis
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Multicenter, Open-label, Uncontrolled Trial to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of OPA-15406 Ointment in Infants Younger Than 2 Years of Age With Atopic Dermatitis
summary: To investigate the efficacy of 0.3% OPA-15406 ointment when administered twice daily for 4 weeks in infants younger than 2 years of age with Atopic Dermatitis

primaryOutcome.measure: Success Rate in IGA (Percentage of Subjects With an IGA Score of 0 or 1 With Improvement by at Least 2 Grades)
